isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - With Headset Jack

svcproc.title: With Headset Jack
svcproc.para: Audio power is fed to the volume control and speaker in the same circuits that are used for the volume control without headset described above in 11.2.8.1. A different volume control panel is utilized for the headset control.
When headphones are plugged into the headset jack, the speakers are switched out of the circuit and the headphones are connected along with additional resistance and capacitance.
